Class TokenVisitor

Provides a simple, virtual API for traversing Token trees generated by the Parser.

Properties

Running

Is the visitor currently traversing a Token tree?

Declaration
protected bool Running { get; set; }
Property Value
Type Description
System.Boolean

Methods

Visit(Token)

Defines the instructions for traversing a tree. To override, null check the Token parameter, set running to true and provide instructions to be carried out on every Token visited. You may - or may not - then call VisitMembers(Token) and VisitChildren(Token), but be sure to set Running = false at the end of this method's scope.

Declaration
public virtual void Visit(Token token)
Parameters
Type Name Description
Token token

The Token to be visited.

VisitChildren(Token)

Visits all Children of the provided Token.

Declaration
protected void VisitChildren(Token token)
Parameters
Type Name Description
Token token

The Token of whose Children you wish to visit.

VisitMembers(Token)

Visits all Polite.Token.Members of the provided Token.

Declaration
protected void VisitMembers(Token token)
Parameters

The Token of whose Polite.Token.Members you wish to visit.
